Colombia’s army killed 15 alleged guerrillas in the southwest of the country, W Radio reported on Thursday. According to the radio station, the alleged FARC dissidents were killed in combat…

title: 15 alleged FARC dissidents killed in southwest Colombia: report

description:
Colombia’s authorities have over the past 13 years restituted only 10% of the land that were stolen during the armed conflict. According to NGO Forjando Futuros, which monitors land restitution,…

title: Only 10% of land stolen during armed conflict restituted since 2011
